activities: GGX is an online trading platform for the offering for sale, sale and purchase of wood pellets.  GGX collects its prospective members’ information, including personal and confidential information, and, upon review authorizes membership.  Once approved, members may list sales of wood pellets and bid on the purchase of wood pellets.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
